螇螇螇

螇字的基本解释

螇
xī
〔螇螰（
l?）〕古书上说的一种蝉。

螇
qī
〔螇蚸（
土蜂。l?）〕蝗的一种。

螇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》胡雞切，平齊，匣。］
(1)螇螰。蝉的一种。
(2)见“螇蛆”。
[②]［qī］
［《廣韻》苦奚切，平齊，溪。］
见“螇2蝷”。

螇字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　螇； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1092第30
【唐韻】胡雞切【集韻】絃雞切，?音奚。【說文】螇螰，蛁蟟也。【鹽鐵論】諸生獨不見季夏之螇乎，音聲入耳，秋風而聲無。互見蛄、蟬二字註。　又螇蚸，見蚸字註。　又【廣韻】苦奚切【集韻】牽奚切，?音谿。與?、?同。土蜂也。

螇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
螇字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Sting
xī
〔螰螰(
l?)] a kind of cicada mentioned in ancient books.
Sting
qī
〔螇蚸(
Bumblebee. l?)] a kind of locust.

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" chicken cut, flush, box. ]
(1) Stingles. A kind of cicada.
(2) See "Maggot".
[②]［qī］
["Guangyun" bitterly cut, level, stream. ]
See "Xiao 2".

[Shen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　螇; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1092 Page 30
[Tang Yun] Hu Ji cut [Ji Yun] Xian Ji cut,? Yin Xi. [Said the text] 螰螰, 蛁蟟 also. [Salt and Iron Theory] All living beings can't see Jixia's stupid, the sound is heard, but the autumn wind is silent. See each other's notes on the two words cricket and cicada.　Zhe Zhe again, see the note of Zhe word.　[Guang Yun] bitterly cut and cut [Ji Yun] cut and cut,? Yinxi. Same as? And ?. Bumblebees too.
